title: Ankh-Arena
description: A dynamic Fantasy Premier League replica. Features complex SQL schema design for player stats, a React.js frontend for team management, and a Node.js API for league logic.

title: Paintly.io
description: A collaborative drawing platform allowing multiple users to sketch simultaneously. Built with Socket.io for low-latency state synchronization and custom drawing algorithms.

title: Rescue Dawn Drone
description: Award-winning autonomous drone for water rescue. Integrated MAX30205 thermal sensors with Arduino and a custom DAQ system to detect at-risk individuals.
